name: Gliscor
description: The Fang Scorpion Pokémon. It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!

abilities.name: Hyper Cutter
abilities.description: This Pokémon’s attack or damage bonuses cannot be decreased by an opponent’s moves.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Sandstorm damage. In addition, its AC increases by 2 in desert terrain, or during a Sandstorm.

abilities.name: Poison Heal
abilities.description: This Pokémon does not suffer the disadvantage effects of the poisoned status. In addition, this Pokémon recovers half of all poison damage it would take, including the damage at each of the end of its turns.
